description: Complete system overview documenting the PDF to Markdown conversion architecture, key components, and their interactions
Detailed documentation of core algorithms including font hierarchy analysis, heading detection, and parallel page processing using GCD
Documentation of image extraction, format optimization algorithms, and asset handling including transparency detection and color complexity analysis
Specification of TextElement and ImageElement data models, their attributes, and relationships within the document structure
Documentation of data flow between components including PDF parsing, content extraction, parallel processing, and Markdown generation
